Rulings.Edison:
●If Chain Summoning and Double Summon are activated during the same turn, you still can only Normal Summon or Set up to 3 times.
●Normal Summoning or Setting a monster with Ultimate Offering does not use one of the three Normal Summons or Sets allowed by Chain Summoning.

Rulings.Base: 1. If "Chain Summoning" and "Double Summon" are activated during the same turn, you still can only Normal Summon or Set up to 3 times.\n2. Normal Summoning or Setting a monster with "Ultimate Offering" does not use one of the three Normal Summons or Sets allowed by "Chain Summoning".
